name: Deepti Nagar

experience.title: Operations Manager
experience.description: - Responsible for monitoring organization's servers, networks and computer systems for irregularity and performance issues- Responsible for directing the activities of IT technicians, both to directly support end users and to assist with IT department upgrades and directives- Developed IT policies and procedures to ensure that the department operates effectively and reliably. Developed Service Level Agreements ( SLA ) for the help desk- Assessed department and business needs related to equipment and services and presented them to vendors, compared pricing and vendor bids with the department's budget in order to negotiate contracts with the vendors.- Introduced new methods to streamline the upgrade process, monitored the system to ensure that it remains stable and usable, and maintained data security through the migration process.
